title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection in Eclipse, such as org.apache.ant, I receive the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Can you please explain what this error message means?
OB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant) in Eclipse, I expected to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. However, I received an error message stating 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
SR: Please investigate why the scoped type hierarchy is not displayed for binary projects when pressing F4 and fix the issue.
